title: Sri Venkateswara University: Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Placement
meta_description: Sri Venkateswara University Admission 2024 is open for various courses. Sri Venkateswara University Admission is based on national level entrance exam and merit basis. Check latest updates and news on Sri Venkateswara University Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Rankings, Placement and other details.

basic_info.name: SVU, Tirupati Admission
description: Directorate of Admissions (DOA) administers the admissions into all PG courses and Research programs. It conducts SVUCET for admission into MA, M.Com., M.Sc., and MS Courses offered by the University and affiliated Colleges of Sri Venkateswara University.

The candidates seeking admission in the B.Tech. program need to go through an entrance test, known as EAMCET. RECET examination conducted by the DOA. All the application processes are conducted online.

basic_info.name: SVU, Tirupati Placements
description: The Placement Cell of Sri Venkateswara University stays in contact with 50+ good companies. More than 60% of students of the university are being placed according to their academic results.

As per NIRF Report of 2020, 157 B.tech graduates got placement with median placement package of 6.0 LPA among total 234 graduates. Here is a list of companies visited for different courses offered by the University in the below table.

faqs.question: Ques. What about the Foreign language course at SVU Tirupati?
faqs.answer: Ans.The language course is a diploma course offered by the University. There are around 15 Diploma and declaration courses. The University provides entry-level position chances to students.

faqs.question: Ques. Are study halls available at SVU Tirupati?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, the wide-open study halls contain a whiteboard and a projector that is utilized for instructing.

faqs.question: Ques. Does SVU Tirupati provide any transportation facilities?
faqs.answer: Ans.The University transports all students from and to all areas in and around Andhra Pradesh. This helps day scholars to occupants arrive at the University on time.

faqs.question: Ques. Is there any entrance test conducted for admission into the MBA course at SVU Tirupati?
faqs.answer: Ans.No, there is no need of the entrance test for getting into MBA courses offered by the University.

faqs.question: Ques. Is Hostel available at the SVU Tirupati for outstation applicants?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, at present, the University gives Hostel service to Boys, Girls, and even the guests. There are additional staff quarters in the University grounds for the faculties too.

faqs.question: Ques. What are the job prospects for the SVU Tirupati students after pursuing the Arts degree?
faqs.answer: Ans.Many Arts students can opt for higher studies and research so that he/she can draw higher pay. However, the placement cell of the University also assists students to find the job according to their profile.

Section.name: About SVU
Section.description:
Sri Venkateswara University (SVU), Tirupati was set-up in 1954. The University is ranked 60 in University category by NIRF 2023. It is accredited by NAAC with “A+” Grade. University is offering UG, PG, and Ph.D. courses under disciplines of Engineering & Technology, Arts, Science, and Commerce. Admissions are offered strictly based on entrance or qualifying examination.
For UG level, it offers courses such as B.tech, B.Pharm, and B.Ed and PG level courses like M.tech, MA,M.Sc, MBA, Integrated M.tech are offered. The mode of application for the course is online. The University placement has recorded the highest pay of highest INR 6 LPA in 2020 for Technical courses. Over 60% of students got placed and Corporates like Cognizant, Dell, IBM, and Wipro, etc have visited Sri Venkateswara University campus for the placement.
Sri Venkateswara University is ranked among Top universities in Andhra Pradesh as well as in India. Here is the list of some ranking:
Students can choose over 72 courses in Science, Commerce, and Humanities, Engineering, Management, Pharmacy, and many more. as tabulated in the following table:
Eligibility: Graduate in equivalent examination with minimum of 45% (UR/OBC) and 40% (ST/SC) Duration: 2 years
Read More SVU Tirupati Courses and Fees
Directorate of Admissions (DOA) administers the admissions into all PG courses and Research programs. It conducts SVUCET for admission into MA, M.Com., M.Sc., and MS Courses offered by the University and affiliated Colleges of Sri Venkateswara University.
The candidates seeking admission in the B.Tech. program need to go through an entrance test, known as EAMCET. RECET examination conducted by the DOA. All the application processes are conducted online.
How to Apply?
The Placement Cell of Sri Venkateswara University stays in contact with 50+ good companies. More than 60% of students of the university are being placed according to their academic results.
